column4: This release is pretty good, I'm just not sure if I fixed the login bug I was having or not. I guess I'll find out later
I ca n't consistantly recreate it
Apparently doing unity --reset fixes it so we'll see.
No, it's like when you try to log in the screen is black and all you see is the mouse
I looked it up and doing unity --reset apparently fixes it so we'll see.
If that doesn't work then I'll try something else.
my problem is that ubuntu just crashes out of nowhere and logs out
i am trying to look for help online apperently i am the onlyone with this issue
maybe my hardware is faulty but i have upgraded ubuntu without issues from 8.04 to 11.04 without issues, i decided to do clean install this time
if you're ready to try anything at this point I'd try the 32 bit version. It could work
